'''Stories of You and the Aranara''' is Quest Item that can be used to exchange for weapon [[Forging Blueprints]] from [[Aravinay]] in the [[Tree of Dreams, Vanarana]].

One copy of Stories of You and the Aranara can be obtained in these quests:
# After completing [[The World of Aranara]] in [[Aranyaka]]: Part II - [[Dream Nursery]]
# Defeating the [[Abyss Lector]] in [[Vimana Agama]]
# After fixing the [[Varuna Contraption]] in [[Varuna Gatha]]
# After completing [[Agnihotra Sutra]]
# After saving [[Rana]] in [[Aranyaka]]: Part IV
